attributes.action: Move the Rugby World Cup Final to Cardiff from Twickenham
attributes.background: England have unfortunately bowed out of their home World Cup. This is a sad thing, but it opens the opportunity to use the Best Stadium in the world of Rugby for the biggest match of all... plus it means a home nation might get a home final.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament don't decide where the Rugby World Cup is held. You could contact World Rugby directly about this:

http://www.worldrugby.org/
